data.what_is:
SAS 360 Discover enables organizations to go beyond channel-level data collection to collect detailed customer-level digital data across owned digital properties. This functionality allows you to use the collected data to gain new insights using analytics that enable better true omnichannel digital insight for marketers.

Build A Complete, Unified View of Your Customers
Capture all customer activities down to the keystroke, seeing everything they did and where they went across your digital properties. With our customer experience data model, you can integrate with your offline data, combining sources to gain a complete view of your customer for better insight, leading to more relevant offers and customer experiences.

Reduced Tagging Means Reduced Cost of Ownership
With a single line of HTML code, you can capture the dynamic collection of complete, detailed, and accurate customer interaction data without heavy tagging. Changes to the page design are accounted for automatically during data capture, eliminating the need to continually retag the page.

Open Data Model Supports Immediate Data Analysis and Integration
The solution houses all online data in an open, customer-centric data model that promotes further data exploration and analysis. Online data is logically structured within a predefined business context, enabling integration with existing customer data, and allowing nontechnical staff to perform ad hoc reporting quickly and easily.

Rise Above the Limitations of Traditional Digital Analytic Reporting
End-to-end data management, visualization, data mining, and machine learning capabilities cater to no-code, low-code, and high-code users. Empower data-driven team members of all skill levels and coding languages with automation and customization capabilities to maximize the analytical potential of the web and mobile first-party data assets.

Infuse AI Into Your Customer Journey Strategies
Customers provide a wealth of information on your websites and mobile apps that reveal their buying plans, significant life changes, and other insights that are frequently never communicated to the marketers responsible for personalizing their journeys. Capturing this digital intelligence and integrating it into analytical models derives actionable scoring for segmentation, propensities, recommendations, and reinforcement learning. The marketer can leverage prescriptive insights in the same manner as filtering, suppressions, and arbitration rules.
data.product_description: Generate business value quickly with 360-degree customer data views, segments, reports and models.With the SAS Customer Intelligence solution, organizations can speed time-to-market for data activation and customer engagement, while adhering to customer requirements for privacy, transparency, and trust. Our modern, AI-powered, multichannel marketing hub, allows brands to have the flexibility to create personalized journeys, while effectively leveraging resources and maximizing impact.Built from the ground up, our solution flows seamlessly across all functionality from data ingestion, exploration, modelops, orchestration, decisioning, and governance through to activation and measurement for a best-in-class MarTech solution. Designed with the everyday marketer in mind we leverage a hybrid architecture to save on ETL costs and provide the flexibility on where you keep your data.As your business evolves, so can your messaging. Shift from campaigns to journeys with comprehensive customer journey management and optimization. Use behavioral, demographic, and historical data to guide consumers to desired outcomes resulting in higher conversion rates, deeper engagement, and increased lifetime value.

features.name: Integration APIs

initial_reviews.review_title: Personalized Customer experience via SAS Customer Intelligence 360
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about SAS Customer Intelligence 360?
The best part of SAS customer intelligence 360 is that it provided me holistic view of how customer interacts and that helped me build customized content for customers to help and grow in business. While set up, it was simple to integrate and got support whenever neeeded from SAS Team like i was facing challenges in integrating with tool.

What do you dislike about SAS Customer Intelligence 360?
Pricing is a bit on higher side which can be reduced so that it can be utilized by small businesses.

What problems is SAS Customer Intelligence 360 solving and how is that benefiting you?
I had to understand the customer and their experience for which I used to collect a lot of data and for each customer. Thios was time consuming and a lot of analysis required. I then started using SAS Customer Intelligence 360 which provided me a platform to feed my data and provided real time view of how customer interacts and this gave me opportunity to improve my market analysis and helped me build customized products for customers.

initial_reviews.review_title: Digital marketing hub for engaging with customers
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about SAS Customer Intelligence 360?
It provides me space to plan all my activities and once that is done then I can manage and see the level of interaction with my customers. It provided me the tracking abilities so that I can improve in areas where interaction was less. I can customize for customers of certain age group or categories. Easiuly , I was able to pull reports. Once i had query, I was able to contact customer care easily and get it resolved quickly.

What do you dislike about SAS Customer Intelligence 360?
I feel pricing was a bit high for someone like me who is not working on a very large scale.

What problems is SAS Customer Intelligence 360 solving and how is that benefiting you?
Basically I wanted to create contents for different groups of people based on age as their way of interaction is different. So I came across SAS Customer Intelligence 360 which had this feature and it helped me create content and I can see that engagement level is very high now.

Overall, SAS 360 Engage helps organizations understand customer behavior and preferences, enabling them to create personalized experiences that drive customer loyalty and engagement. This helps organizations increase customer retention, reduce customer churn, and improve overall marketing ROI.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about SAS Customer Intelligence 360?
SAS Marketing Automation is a good product, and I feel that this  product has enhanced the convenience the it's user by laying out the product on the very sweet point. It is fantabulously designed, and well laid out. It reduces the overall turnaround time  for designing a campaign, with a well defined cycle of creation, approval and execution of campaigns.

What do you dislike about SAS Customer Intelligence 360?
The version I used was not very stable, and used to trip a bit frequently adding to frustration of it's users. I am sure the later version must have improved with time. SAS InfoMaps is required  to compliment SAS MA, which was a bit of pain initially, but we have to design overall architecture (including data) accordingly. Otherwise the product was pretty good.

What problems is SAS Customer Intelligence 360 solving and how is that benefiting you?
Campaign define, design, approval/rejection and execution (overall life cycle of a campaign) is what we used this product for, and it well served the purpose.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about SAS Customer Intelligence 360?
I like the ability to see all the information based on criteria I select. It is an efficient tool that is easy to use. I like navigation ability throughout the layout. It has really helped learn more about my market. Throughout the company people are able to find information of customers a lot quicker for those who are inexperienced or slower to manually look up customer info. It has really improved our database all around! Truly Great Product

What do you dislike about SAS Customer Intelligence 360?
It can sometimes crash on my computer, sometimes the information in not accurate and simply not there so i will have to look it up manually which can get frustrating on busy work days. From time to time we will find looking up information manually will be easier. The cost is getting higher now that more people are discovering this great product and we are afraid it will keep increasing to a price we no longer will be willing to pay for or have the funds to expense unfortunately.

Recommendations to others considering SAS Customer Intelligence 360:
Great product don't be afraid to ask support for help!! They are always available and friendly when talking with anyone!!

What problems is SAS Customer Intelligence 360 solving and how is that benefiting you?
Bad data problems and extra data enhancements to our systems are some reasons we have used SAS customer intelligence 360. We are solving every business current problem to fulfill their customer database with accurate data to help sale process go smoother and for the whole company to run more efficiently.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about SAS Customer Intelligence 360?
The software allows you to perform the appropriate and necessary statistical tests to quantitatively analyze data.

What do you dislike about SAS Customer Intelligence 360?
The SAS interface is not particularly intuitive, some training would be required for new users.

Recommendations to others considering SAS Customer Intelligence 360:
Educate users before utilizing the software - learning the functions ahead of time will save time when processing data and results

What problems is SAS Customer Intelligence 360 solving and how is that benefiting you?
The platform stores all of the data and produces results from the tests in one place, allowing the user to translate the data and display it in different ways.
